page.description: Get the default font name and size for this workbook.
page.prototype: .DefaultFont as L (FontName as C, FontSize as N)

argument.name: FontName
argument.description: A character variable that will be set to the default font name.

argument.name: FontSize
argument.description: A numeric variable that will be set to the default font size.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns *[xb:.T.]* if operation succeeds, otherwise *[xb:.F.]*. The Office::Excel2003Document CallResult object will contain additional information if the operation fails.

page.example:
dim sheet as Office::Excel2003Document dim font as P dim font.name as c dim font.size as n
? sheet.defaultFont(font.name,font.size) = .T.
? font = name = "Arial" size = 10
